name: Blade
story: A member of the Stellaron Hunters, and a swordsman who abandoned his body to become a blade.Pledges loyalty to "Destiny's Slave," and possesses a terrifying self-healing ability.

skills.name: Shard Sword
skills.description: Deals minor Wind DMG to an enemy.

skills.name: Hellscape
skills.description: Consumes HP to Enhance Basic ATK, and this turn does not end after this Skill is used.

skills.name: Death Sentence
skills.description: Sets current HP to 50% of Max HP, and deals massive Wind DMG to a single enemy and Wind DMG to adjacent targets.

skills.name: Shuhu's Gift
skills.description: When Blade's HP is lowered, he gains 1 stack of Charge. When maximum Charge stack is reached, Blade immediately deals Wind DMG to all enemies and restores HP. Then, all Charges are consumed.

skills.name: Karma Wind
skills.description: Attacks the enemy. After entering combat, consumes own HP and deals Wind DMG to all enemies.

skills.name: Forest of Swords
skills.description: Consumes HP and deals Wind DMG to an enemy, as well as minor Wind DMG to adjacent targets.

eidolons.name: Blade Cuts the Deepest in Hell
eidolons.description: Blade's Ultimate deals additionally increased DMG to a single enemy target, with the increased amount equal to 150% of the tally of Blade's HP loss in the current battle.The tally of Blade's HP loss in the current battle is capped at 90% of his Max HP. The tally value will be reset and re-accumulated after his Ultimate has been used.

eidolons.name: Ten Thousand Sorrows From One Broken Dream
eidolons.description: When Blade is in the Hellscape state, his CRIT Rate increases by 15%.

eidolons.name: Hardened Blade Bleeds Coldest Shade
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Rejected by Death, Infected With Life
eidolons.description: When Blade's current HP drops to 50% or lower of his Max HP, increases his Max HP by 20%. Stacks up to 2 time(s).

eidolons.name: Death By Ten Lords' Gaze
eidolons.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Reborn Into an Empty Husk
eidolons.description: The maximum number of Charge stacks is reduced to 4. The DMG of the follow-up attack triggered by Blade's Talent additionally increases by 50% of his Max HP.
